caption.p: Exogenous miR-21 is delivered by MVs into recipient cardiomyocytes. RT-qPCR of relative miR-21 expression in NRK-52E cells in the absence or presence of 5 ng/mL of TGF-β1 for 12 h. Results are presented as means ± SE of three independent experiments. (A) RT-qPCR of relative miR-21 expression in recipient cardiomyocytes. Results are presented as means ± SE of three independent experiments. (B) * p < 0.05 versus control.
